sections.title: Darechaser (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Darechaser class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Adrenaline Rush (Ex) (Darechaser)
sections.description: Grants bonuses to physical skill checks and ability checks for a limited number of rounds per day as a free action, followed by fatigue. Can be sustained using rage rounds if the darechaser has the rage class feature.

sections.title: Dare (Ex) (Darechaser)
sections.description: Allows spending adrenaline rush rounds as a swift action to add exploding dice to rolls that fulfill declared objectives, with additional benefits if the dice are necessary for success. Die type increases with level (d6/d8/d10) and explodes on maximum results.

sections.title: Adrenaline Deed (Ex) (Darechaser)
sections.description: Provides additional benefits while using adrenaline rush, chosen from a list of specialized abilities that enhance movement, combat, or skill use. Gained every 2 levels starting at 2nd level.

sections.title: Record Breaker (Ex) (Darechaser)
sections.description: Once per day enhancement to the dare ability that doubles or triples the number of bonus dice added to a single d20 roll, representing surpassing mortal limits. Enhanced effect when combined with adrenaline rush.
